items.summary: Add a language selector UI to the header with a globe (earth) icon button. On desktop (md and up), place the globe button immediately to the right of the existing "News" navigation link in the headerâ€™s desktop navigation row. On mobile (below md), place a globe icon button next to the existing hamburger (3 lines) menu button.

Implement language selection state with default language set to English on first app load. Provide a menu list containing exactly these languages (displayed in English): English (default), Hindi, Kazakhstan, Chinese, Spanish, Thailand, Russian, Japanese, French, Portugese, Italian, Arabic, Tagalog, Vietnamese, Indonesian. Selecting a language should immediately update the current selection state and reflect the selected item visually in the menu.
Persist the selected language on the client so that refreshing the page or reopening the app restores the previously selected language; if no persisted value exists, fall back to English.
